Headline: Application Intent Summary

current_job_data.title: Graduate Java Developer - Finance
current_job_data.description:
About the job

Junior Java Developer - Finance




Are you a 2024 / 2025 graduate in Comp Sci or a Java Developer with one year of experience, looking for a new opportunity in Finance?




I am working with a next-generation Capital Markets business based in Central London, who are looking for a Junior or +1 year of experience Java Developer to join them.




As a Junior Java Developer, you will have commercial or industrial experience in working with Core Java, and an interest in Capital markets, Trading, Forex etc; and relish working in a small business with approximately 20.




Requirements:

1st or 2:1 from OxBridge or Top Russell group University
experience working with Java ( projects or commercial / industrial experience)
Knowledge in Finance, Front Office
Connectivity / Low Latency Java
Knowledge in Garbage collection / Memory
current_job_data.description_html:
About the job

Junior Java Developer - Finance


Are you a 2024 / 2025 graduate in Comp Sci or a Java Developer with one year of experience, looking for a new opportunity in Finance?


I am working with a next-generation Capital Markets business based in Central London, who are looking for a Junior or +1 year of experience Java Developer to join them.


As a Junior Java Developer, you will have commercial or industrial experience in working with Core Java, and an interest in Capital markets, Trading, Forex etc; and relish working in a small business with approximately 20.


Requirements:
  • 1st or 2:1 from OxBridge or Top Russell group University
  • experience working with Java ( projects or commercial / industrial experience)
  • Knowledge in Finance, Front Office
  • Connectivity / Low Latency Java
  • Knowledge in Garbage collection / Memory

Cover letter:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am excited to apply for the IT Service Desk Operator position at Logisnext UK Ltd. With over three years of experience in service desk roles, coupled with a solid technical background and a passion for delivering exceptional IT support, I am eager to contribute to your esteemed organization.

In my previous role as an AI Data Annotator & Reasoning Specialist at Outlier AI, I honed my skills in troubleshooting, technical analysis, and providing first-line support. My experience with Windows 10/11, Microsoft 365, and IT ticketing systems aligns closely with the core responsibilities outlined in your job listing. I also possess a robust understanding of IP, DNS, DHCP, and subnetting principles, which enables me to swiftly diagnose and resolve technical issues.

A notable achievement in my career is the development of a real-time wildfire detection system during a research project at the University of Sheffield. This project required meticulous data analysis, effective use of machine learning models, and a collaborative approach to integrating IoT sensors and real-time mapping. The result was an 86% accuracy rate in fire detection, demonstrating my problem-solving capabilities and technical expertise.

Furthermore, I developed and deployed an AI Personal Image Generation App using a full-stack solution in Flutter, Firebase, and OAuth, which showcases my proficiency in both software development and user support. This application was successfully published with a growing user base, reflecting my commitment to delivering high-quality, user-centered solutions.

At Logisnext UK Ltd, I am thrilled about the opportunity to support colleagues across the UK and Europe, contributing to the innovative logistics solutions you provide. My proactive problem-solving mindset, excellent communication skills, and dedication to high standards of customer service will enable me to thrive in this role and drive the success of your IT team.

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss how my background, skills, and projects align with the goals of Logisnext UK Ltd.

Sincerely,
Matthaios Markatis
matthaiosmarkatis@gmail.com
07480 699246
What documentation do you hold to demons: British Citizen (UK Passport, Birth Certificate and NI Number)
What expereince do you have of developin: Experience via Personal Projects and full stack app development
Please select the most accurate statemen: I am fully authorized to work in the application country and do not require work visa support.
How many years of Construction experienc: Based on my background and experiences detailed in my CV, I currently do not have direct construction experience as outlined by professional roles in construction project management or quantity surveying. However, my extensive experience in managing complex projects, including leading a diverse range of technically demanding initiatives in AI and software development, has equipped me with significant transferable skills in areas such as project execution, team management, and stakeholder collaboration. My exposure to developing and managing large-scale projects, such as an IoT-based wildfire detection system and AI-driven mobile applications, underlines my capabilities in handling multiple project components simultaneously while adhering to strict timelines and quality standards. Although I have yet to directly engage within the construction sector, I am eager and committed to adapting my robust project management skills and deep technical knowledge to meet the rigorous demands and excellence that this role requires at Optimise by Recruitment.
How many years of Health Care Provider e: Based on my existing experience as detailed in my CV, I currently do not possess direct healthcare provider experience within a registered nursing capacity. However, I have extensive experience in team management and operational leadership roles within high-pressure environments, such as my tenure as a Team Leader at Meltdown-Wetherspoons. My background in AI data annotation and project management has equipped me with strong analytical and problem-solving skills that are applicable to managing complex systems, which aligns with the requirements of a Registered Home Manager. Further discussions could help explore how my skill set can be adapted to meet the demands of this role in nursing home management effectively.
What has attracted you to apply for this:
I am thrilled to apply for the Full-Stack PHP Developer position at Vero HR because it presents a unique opportunity to work at the forefront of financial technology innovation in the UK and Ireland. My academic background in physics from the University of Sheffield, combined with hands-on experience in data science and AI engineering, equips me with the technical depth and analytical skills required for this role.

The prospect of engaging with tightly integrated AWS services like ECS, ECR, and Lambda aligns perfectly with my experience and enthusiasm for cloud-based applications. I am particularly excited about the opportunity to contribute to and shape the company's technological strategy by bringing forth my experience in modern PHP and JavaScript frameworks like Laravel and React, and my proficiency in CI/CD and DevOps practices, notably with GitHub Actions.

I am impressed by the company’s commitment to encouraging autonomy and innovative problem-solving. My previous projects, such as collaborating on a real-time wildfire detection system and an AI-based image generation app, demonstrate my ability to tackle complex challenges and develop robust, scalable solutions that align with Vero HR’s innovative ethos.

Moreover, the chance to work remotely yet still interact with a vibrant team during in-person meetings excites me as it offers the flexibility and team interaction I value. The comprehensive benefits package further enhances my attraction to this role, promising both professional growth and personal well-being.

Overall, I am eager to bring my full-stack development skills and a proactive, detail-oriented approach to the dynamic environment at Vero HR, contributing to groundbreaking solutions within the fintech space.
Please summarise your relevant experienc:
I am an accomplished Full-Stack Developer with a strong background in both PHP and JavaScript, making me a suitable candidate for the Full-Stack PHP Developer position at Vero HR. Holding a BSc in Physics from the University of Sheffield, I have honed my computational skills and have gained extensive experience in both front-end and back-end development.

My hands-on expertise includes modern test-driven PHP and a deep understanding of vanilla JavaScript, as well as working with CI/CD and DevOps tools such as GitHub Actions. I am proficient in using PHP MVC frameworks, notably Laravel, aligning well with your technological stack. My strong SQL skills enable me to write and optimize complex queries, ensuring efficient data retrieval and manipulation.

Throughout my projects, I've demonstrated the ability to integrate 3rd party APIs and develop robust APIs for other developers, supported by my comfort with the Linux command-line. Additionally, my experience with cross-browser HTML/CSS using frameworks like Bootstrap, coupled with JavaScript, supports seamless UI/UX development across platforms.

My technical toolkit extends to AWS services, including ECS and Lambda, and familiarity with Docker, vital for handling scalable, cloud-native applications. I've tackled complex architectural problems in prior projects, employing defensive programming techniques to bolster security and efficacy.

I thrive on solving challenging problems independently, and my collaborative experience in high-pressure environments has finely tuned my communication skills, both with technical peers and non-technical stakeholders. I am eager to leverage my skills to contribute to Vero HR's ongoing technological strategy as part of a forward-thinking fintech team.
Have you worked with both frontend and b: I have extensive experience with both frontend and backend technologies, aligning well with the Full Stack Software Engineer role at DoiT. My technical proficiency includes JavaScript/TypeScript, with expertise in frameworks such as React and Node.js, crucial for frontend and backend development respectively. I am adept in building RESTful APIs, managing database integrations using SQL/NoSQL (e.g., PostgreSQL, Firebase), and deploying applications in cloud environments like AWS, which are integral to modern web applications. Furthermore, my hands-on experience with CI/CD practices ensures efficient software delivery and team collaboration, key competencies for enhancing the health of the codebase and implementing new features at DoiT.
Summary:
I am enthusiastic about the opportunity to join Quanticate as a Principal Statistician II. My academic background as a BSc Physics graduate from the University of Sheffield, complemented by advanced certifications in Data Science and AI Engineering from IBM, has equipped me with a deep understanding of statistical analysis, hypothesis testing, and machine learning. I have hands-on experience developing and validating complex statistical models, designing end-to-end data pipelines, and leading interdisciplinary projects that require meticulous attention to both scientific rigor and operational efficiency.

In my recent role as an AI Data Annotator and Reasoning Specialist, I have honed my skills in leading technical teams, guiding project delivery, and ensuring high-quality outputs under strict deadlines. I am experienced in providing mentorship and clear statistical guidance, aligning closely with Quanticate’s values of quality and people development. Additionally, my collaborative work in cross-functional settings and exposure to large-scale data-driven projects prepares me to take on consulting responsibilities and provide expert advice in regulatory environments.

While my direct experience in clinical trials and SAS programming is developing, my foundation in rigorous statistical methodology, project leadership, and commitment to continuous professional growth will allow me to quickly adapt to Quanticate’s requirements. I am drawn to Quanticate’s commitment to learning, flexible working, and delivering innovative solutions in the pharmaceutical and healthcare sectors. I look forward to the opportunity to contribute to high-impact clinical studies and to inspire excellence within your team.
How many digital marketing campaigns hav: As an individual with a strong technical background and hands-on project experience, I have managed and contributed to several online initiatives that required strategic planning, audience targeting, and community engagement—key aspects of digital marketing campaigns. While my primary expertise is in data science, AI, and software development, my experience launching and promoting applications such as a personalized AI image generation app and an intelligent LinkedIn Job Application Automator has given me exposure to online campaign management, user acquisition strategies, and retention techniques. These experiences have equipped me with both the technical and analytical skills to effectively plan, execute, and evaluate social media marketing campaigns. I am keen to bring my quick learning ability, creative problem-solving, and passion for building communities to PeakTew’s dynamic startup environment, and I am eager to further develop my digital marketing skills as part of your team.
State the average audience size reached: Throughout my previous projects, including the launch and promotion of a personalized AI image generation app and an intelligent LinkedIn Job Application Automator, I successfully developed and executed digital marketing initiatives that reached audiences averaging between several hundred to over 1,500 users per campaign. My campaigns have focused on targeted user acquisition, community engagement, and delivering measurable traction in online communities. These experiences have given me a solid foundation in crafting outreach strategies and analyzing campaign performance, which I am excited to expand further as part of PeakTew’s growing community.
Approximately how many minutes will it t: I am based in Sheffield, so the commute to 1 Mark Square, London EC2A 4EG would take approximately 150 minutes each way by train, considering the typical journey to London St Pancras International and onward travel via the Underground or bus to the office. I am fully willing to commute as needed and accommodate in-office requirements.
How did you hear about this vacancy ?: I discovered this Project Engineer vacancy at Weetabix while proactively searching for engineering roles aligned with my background in technical project delivery and data-driven process improvement. As a BSc Physics graduate with hands-on experience leading technology-focused projects and a keen interest in the food and FMCG sector, I was drawn to Weetabix's reputation for high-quality standards and continuous innovation. I am excited by the opportunity to contribute my analytical skills, safety mindset, and experience in end-to-end project implementation to your team.
Please indicate your current salary and: My current salary is £30,000. For this Project Engineer role, my salary expectation is in line with industry standards and the value I can bring, so I am open to discussing a competitive package that reflects my engineering background, qualifications, and experience. I am particularly interested in Weetabix's bonus structure, excellent pension contributions, annual salary review, and comprehensive benefits such as Bupa Healthcare and flexible working options, as these show a strong commitment to employee well-being. I am happy to provide further details and am keen to discuss total compensation in line with your established bands.
What is your motivation for seeking a ne: I am seeking a new role to leverage my strong background in project delivery, engineering, and data-driven problem solving in an environment that values continuous improvement and high-quality outcomes. I am excited by Weetabix’s commitment to excellence, safety, and innovation in project execution, as well as its focus on effective stakeholder collaboration and financial oversight. My experience leading teams, managing technical projects, and applying analytical skills makes me well-suited to contribute to Weetabix’s strategic goals and to develop further within a dynamic and supportive organisation.
If you selected \"Other\" for the previo: With a BSc in Physics from the University of Sheffield and professional experience as an AI Data Annotator and Reasoning Specialist at Outlier AI, I have a strong foundation in Python development, machine learning, and AI system evaluation. My technical expertise includes hands-on work with Python libraries such as NumPy, Pandas, and Scikit-learn, as well as deployment of AI solutions and end-to-end data pipelines. I have developed and evaluated machine learning models for a range of projects, including an IoT-based wildfire detection system and custom LLM integrations, reflecting my deep engagement with both practical programming and AI evaluation tasks. I am highly detail-oriented, adaptable, and committed to contributing to the advancement of cutting-edge AI by providing high-quality, nuanced feedback and model assessment. Prolific’s mission to build ethically sourced, diverse data resonates with me, and I am eager to participate as a Domain Expert to help train future AI models.
Your Notice Period/Availability: I am available to start immediately and am happy to be contacted regarding future opportunities at Burendo. My strong foundation in full stack development, cloud integration, and AI projects—as demonstrated through my BSc in Physics, IBM certifications, and practical experience with Python, JavaScript, cloud services, DevOps tools, and CI/CD pipelines—aligns closely with the skills and behaviours valued at Burendo. I am passionate about engineering, eager to keep learning, and thrive in collaborative environments focused on problem-solving, innovation, and knowledge sharing. I look forward to potentially contributing to Burendo’s purpose-driven, pragmatic consultancy culture and supporting your mission to empower organisations through technology.
At AND Digital we embrace diversity and: Thank you for your commitment to diversity and inclusion. I do not require any adjustments or support at this time, but I appreciate your proactive approach and will reach out if anything is needed during the process.
What interests you about engineering, an:
I have always been fascinated by the way engineering shapes the world around us, from the everyday products we rely on to the large-scale systems that power entire industries. My background in physics has provided me with a strong analytical mindset, problem-solving skills, and a deep understanding of how systems work, which naturally draws me to engineering, particularly in areas of electrical control and automation. I am especially interested in this apprenticeship at Marshalls because it offers a unique combination of hands-on experience and structured learning, allowing me to apply concepts from my academic studies to real-world engineering challenges.

Through my degree and various technical projects, I have developed practical skills in programming, electronics, and data-driven system design, including building IoT-based sensor systems and deploying automation solutions. These experiences have given me a keen appreciation for reliable, innovative engineering and the value of teamwork in achieving set goals. I am excited about the opportunity to learn from experienced engineers at Marshalls and to contribute to the company’s commitment to best-in-class technical solutions and continuous improvement.

I believe I would excel in this apprenticeship due to my strong work ethic, eagerness to learn, and ability to collaborate effectively in team environments. I am motivated by new challenges and am willing to take on the responsibilities of national travel and site work, as outlined in the role. I am confident that this apprenticeship will enable me to gain the specialist knowledge and hands-on skills needed to become a highly capable Electrical Control & Automation Engineer, and I look forward to developing my career with Marshalls.
How do you plan to get to our site (S66: I plan to commute to both the site (S66 7RH) and the college (DN15 8QW) using reliable public transport and, when necessary, arrange car-sharing or taxi services to ensure punctuality and consistent attendance. I am fully committed to making whatever arrangements are required to fulfil my responsibilities across both locations throughout the apprenticeship.
What is your earliest availability to st: I am available to start immediately and am enthusiastic about the opportunity to contribute to Playtech Neon as soon as possible.
Are you currently based in Manchester or: While I am currently based in Sheffield, I am fully able and willing to commit to a hybrid work arrangement and commute to Manchester 2-3 days each week or as required. I am eager to contribute my experience in systems engineering and technical support to Playtech, and I am enthusiastic about joining a dynamic team focused on innovation and growth within the gaming industry.
I am a BSc Physics graduate with a strong background in computational methods, data analysis, and full-stack development. My technical skills include proficiency in Python, C/C++, and experience with Git and CI/CD pipelines, as well as advanced competencies in machine learning, deep learning, and AI-driven application development. I have designed and deployed complex software solutions, including a real-time IoT-based wildfire detection system and a production-ready AI image generation app with end-to-end architecture. My experience also covers statistical analysis, 3D data visualization, and robust API integration, which are transferable to Unity-based development. While I have not directly worked with Unity or C#, my strong foundation in physics, experience with 3D simulations, and fast learning curve for new tools and frameworks equip me to quickly develop expertise in Unity, 3D animation, and robotics applications. I am comfortable working in fast-paced start-up environments, have led teams in both technical and operational settings, and am passionate about leveraging technology to simplify and enhance robotics programming.
When would you be available to start in: I am available to start immediately, or as soon as required, and am eager to bring my skills in engineering, computational methods, and data analysis to Rotork. My academic background in Physics from the University of Sheffield, combined with practical experience in engineering project delivery and solution development, has prepared me to take on the responsibilities of this Application Engineer role. I am excited about the opportunity to contribute to Rotork’s continued innovation and market leadership and am ready to join your team as soon as needed.
Do you have a Right to Work in the UK?\n: I am a British or Irish Citizen
I am a British or Irish Citizen
Message to the hiring team:
Dear Hiring Team,

I am excited to apply for the DevOps Engineer position at Playtech. My BSc in Physics from the University of Sheffield, combined with recent professional certifications in AI Engineering and Data Science, have allowed me to develop a strong foundation in scripting (Python, Bash), automation, cloud technologies (AWS, GCP), and full-stack software deployment. My hands-on experience with major deployment tools, infrastructure validation, and troubleshooting aligns closely with the requirements for this role.

In my recent role as an AI Data Annotator & Reasoning Specialist, I collaborated across technical and non-technical teams, demonstrating my ability to communicate complex concepts and deliver projects to production. My background in developing automation solutions, including an end-to-end LinkedIn job application platform using Git and CI/CD workflows, reflects my commitment to streamlining processes and delivering robust, scalable solutions.

Playtech’s commitment to innovation resonates with me, and I am eager to contribute my technical expertise and drive for continuous improvement to your team. I am particularly motivated by the opportunity to work in a diverse, supportive environment while contributing to advanced infrastructure and deployment projects that power industry-leading gaming experiences.

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss how my skills and ambitions align with Playtech’s vision.

Best regards,
Matthaios Markatis
After submitting your application you wi: With a strong background in data science, machine learning, and a comprehensive technical toolkit spanning Python, cloud services, and full-stack development, I am highly motivated to join Focus Group as an IT Pre-sales Engineer. My experience building end-to-end AI solutions, designing cloud-integrated platforms, and delivering technical content to both technical and non-technical audiences aligns well with the responsibilities in this role. I am adept at collaborating with multidisciplinary teams, conducting requirements gathering, and presenting tailored solutions in high-pressure environments. I am particularly excited by Focus Group’s dedication to technological excellence and customer-centric innovation, and I am eager to contribute my expertise in cloud infrastructure, networking, and solution design to support your continued growth and client success.
We\u2019d love to hear what makes you ex: I am excited about the opportunity to join zeroheight as a Data Analyst - Product because I am passionate about using data-driven insights to accelerate digital product innovation and empower product teams. As a BSc Physics graduate and certified IBM Data Scientist and AI Engineer, I bring a solid foundation in advanced analytics, SQL, Python, and experience with tools like Amplitude and dbt. My previous work developing and deploying end-to-end data solutions, including analytics dashboards, ML deployment, and full-stack applications, equips me to collaborate effectively with product teams and communicate insights clearly to stakeholders. I am drawn to zeroheight’s mission and remote-first culture, and I am eager to contribute to building data capabilities that drive world-class product development.
